title: Getting Priority Queue for Connection Issue bug
body: I jumped into a flex game, and when I got to the loading screen, my screen became black, and I couldn't connect. I saw that riot said that they are aware of the connection issues, and yet here I am with 20 minute queues

replies.body: Just press cancel and reconnect from the client. Works 100% of the time. If it doesn't, the problem is on your end, not Riot's.

how. wheres this cancel button? I dont see it. It just tried to load into the loading menu and it bugsplats then returns to the client with the reconnect button. I have been playing fine even since yesterday. They unlock camille, then it stops working.
I doubt it om "his end". Maybe its a software issue. I just posted a potential fix to the problem not too long ago. Go check it out and test it out in a custom game instead of pvp.

I agree with *Regaline*, if the quick *cancel* and *reconnect* from inside the client doesn't resolve this, or if you weren't seeing the "Network disconnection" error, then this is *unrelated* to the known issue.

Let me know if you have any questions or if you can provide more information on what you experienced so we can troubleshoot this together.
